name: VRSADisordersSNOMED
title: VRSA (Disorders) (SNOMED)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains diagnoses or problems that represent that the patient has vancomycin resistant Staphylococcos Aureus.),(Data Element Scope: Diagnoses or problems documented in a clinical record.),(Inclusion Criteria: vancomycin resistant Staphylococcos Aureus; VRSA; glycopeptide resistance),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
